post.body: umm yes? lol
I would have to see what you have so far! dylan@dylankight.com - would like to see your list! I'll pass mine along as well.
Gotcha, my assumption was wildly inaccurate! Looks nice!
you should totally check it out! It's super relaxed and they usually have the best bands playing in town
that's awesome.. I'm assuming it is a Mac, right?
best ofs and lsits are soo much fun!!
ahh yea it's not my scene. I'm much more of an Earl guy myself. They are having an americana night tonight so we will see...
wow.. there ya go! Who needs friends?
I would but I have work ethic.. well, I have to pay rent lol
When I got there so did I lol.. Hope you are well! Man, it is frigid in ATL!!!
as fun as it was.. it was great to be home! Thanks!
it's good to know our man love is still intact.. I missed you to lover lips
I heard about it.. I don't care too much for festivals. Boycotts are fun tho!
I like his style but he is def. hard to swallow for some! Hope you are well!
Awww! I'm so happy for you!
Yes, it is concerning. It is an upgrade from W. though! Right?!
good luck! I alkways love the feeling when a project is completed.. You're almost there!!
I went to Lenox today! LORD! I hate parking at Christmas time there! Hope your shopping adventure wasn't as nuts!
that works??!! LOL
I was just playing along lol
You smell like beef and cheese!!!!!
that looks awesome!
I bet! Did you ever get the Rivers in Reverse record? If so was it any good?
ha! that's funny
He's an interesting fellow! I love his work though.. By the way, sorry for your loss. Be strong. My thoughts are with you.
Listened to xmas music while putting up xmas decorations around the apt. It made the world feel right. Which for moment was all I needed..
Uploading pictures from last nights show
looking forward to going to Lenny's to see my buddy's band tonight
first day back at work since November 26th.. geez!
hello! It's been a while.. Mexico was great but very glad to be home!
I love the feeling you have when you know you only have like minutes left before you get to go home.. FREEDOM!
my new fav drink from Starbucks is a Carmel Apple Spice.. it's like a hug from jesus.
my cat is being extremely sweet this morning but he is kind of spoiled!
getting mighty cold in the A-T-L!
Bob Dylan always sounds good late at night or with a cup of coffee on a Sunday morning
Almost done with work!!
I actually went into a mall and Christmas shopped. I felt like I was fighting terrorists just to get a parking spot. fo real!
Elvis Costello's record, North.. is sooo overlooked! So what if you don't want jazz from Elvis Costello. It seems sublime to me!
